attributes.action: provide a free higher education system for ex-servicemen and women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ex-military personnel should have the opportunity to obtain free higher education training and qualifications courtesy of the Government. The current resettlement system does not offer individuals the opportunity to get a degree or study further. A system similar to that employed in the USA would enhance the employability of those who have served our country.
